edu.illinois.geoalarm

Class CurrMarkerOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.CurrMarkerOverlay

  • public class CurrMarkerOverlay
extends
    This class override ItemizedOverlay<>, to provide an overlay suitable for displaying the current location of the user. This ItemizedOverlay can be used in an instance of the RouteMap class
    Author:
    GeoAlarm
